buginformation.summary: type aliases cannot used type annotations before their definitions
buginformation.description: what steps will reproduce the problem compile the following with full warnings goog provide foo foo goog provide foo foo bar goog scope function param foo bar bar constructor foo foo function bar this bar bar var foo foo foo type foo bar foo prototype bar null constructor foo bar function what the expected output what you see instead this should work but instead get error error bad type annotation unknown type foo bar param foo bar bar this can worked around writing explicitly foo foo bar but this leads strange inconsistencies the code before after the alias definition what version the product are you using what operating system 1346 linux please provide any additional information below this issue was closed revision 1412
